title: SET_VEHICLE_FLAG
content:
0x63AE1A34// SetVehicleFlag
bool SET_VEHICLE_FLAG(Vehicle vehicle, int flagIndex, bool value);Parameters:vehicle: The vehicle to set flag for.flagIndex: Flag index.value: true to enable the flag, false to disable it.This native is a setter for GET_VEHICLE_HAS_FLAG.
codeBlocks:
// SetVehicleFlag
bool SET_VEHICLE_FLAG(Vehicle vehicle, int flagIndex, bool value);

local ped = PlayerPedId()
local vehicle = GetVehiclePedIsIn(ped, false)
-- Example usage for SET_VEHICLE_FLAG
SetVehicleFlag(vehicle, 0, false)
